metadata.title: CVE-2024-26900 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: md: fixkmemleak of rdev->serial If kobject_add() is fail in bind_rdev_to_array(),'rdev->serial' will be alloc not be freed, and kmemleak occurs.unreferenced object 0xffff88815a350000 (size 49152): comm "mdadm", pid 789,jiffies 4294716910 hex dump (first 32 bytes): 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0000 00 00 00 00 00 ................ 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0000 00 00 ................ backtrace (crc f773277a): [<0000000058b0a453>]kmemleak_alloc+0x61/0xe0 [<00000000366adf14>]__kmalloc_large_node+0x15e/0x270 [<000000002e82961b>]__kmalloc_node.cold+0x11/0x7f [<00000000f206d60a>] kvmalloc_node+0x74/0x150[<0000000034bf3363>] rdev_init_serial+0x67/0x170 [<0000000010e08fe9>]mddev_create_serial_pool+0x62/0x220 [<00000000c3837bf0>]bind_rdev_to_array+0x2af/0x630 [<0000000073c28560>]md_add_new_disk+0x400/0x9f0 [<00000000770e30ff>] md_ioctl+0x15bf/0x1c10[<000000006cfab718>] blkdev_ioctl+0x191/0x3f0 [<0000000085086a11>]vfs_ioctl+0x22/0x60 [<0000000018b656fe>] __x64_sys_ioctl+0xba/0xe0[<00000000e54e675e>] do_syscall_64+0x71/0x150 [<000000008b0ad622>]entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x6c/0x74

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26900` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-118-generic - 5.15.0-118.128~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-118-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-118.128~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-118-generic - 5.15.0-118.128~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-118-generic-64k - 5.15.0-118.128~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1067-aws - 5.15.0-1067.73~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1070-azure - 5.15.0-1070.79~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1070-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1070.79~20.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1066-gcp - 5.15.0-1066.74~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1050-gkeop - 5.15.0-1050.57~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1060-ibm - 5.15.0-1060.63~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1062-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1062.68~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-118-lowlatency - 5.15.0-118.128~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-118-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-118.128~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1065-oracle - 5.15.0-1065.71~20.04.1
No subscription required
